New Records: Trent Boult took 3 wickets in the first powerplay of the match
New Zealand removed 5 Sri Lankan batters in the first powerplay
Key Match Events: Trent Boult dismissed Kusal Mendis, Sadeera Samarawickrama, and Charith Asalanka in quick succession
Kusal Perera was dismissed by Lockie Ferguson in the 10th over
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka lost 5 wickets inside the first 10 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lankan top-order was quickly dismissed
